message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you now, as the money will be worth less with each round.
I'll take a bit more, since the money's losing value for me.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  My turn and the clock is ticking.  I'll take $55, you take $45.  Better than waiting for another round!
Split the difference, factoring in my loss to inflation.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take $49 and let's end this. Every round costs you more!
